src_original: sacetūpunarapite maṁjyuśrīḥ kaścideva pṛccheta kiṁ pratiṣṭhiteḥ satvadhāturiti kiṁ tasya tvaṁ vade ||  majyuśrīḥ āha ||  tasyāṁ haṁ bhagavan navaṁ pṛccha evaṁ vadeṁya yat pratiṣṭhito nutpāda dhātustāpratiṣṭhitaḥ satvadhāturiti bhagavānāha ||  yasminsamaye yetvaṁ maṁjyuśrīḥ prajñāpāramitāṁ bhāvayasi tadā kutra pratiṣṭhā prajñāpāramitā bhāvayāsi ||
yasmina ahaṁ bhagavanasamaye prajñāpāramitāṁ bhāvayāmi apratiṣṭhitoyaṁ tasmin aha bhagavan-samaye prajñāpāramitāṁbhāvayāmi ||
rato kuśala mūlaṁ tasmisamaye upacayaṁ gacchatya pacaṁyavā ||
